CustomField.formula: AND( OR( ISBLANK(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_CountMandatoryNotCompletedWOLIs__c), FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_CountMandatoryNotCompletedWOLIs__c <= 0 ), OR( ISBLANK(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__c), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__c)), OR( NOT(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_CoreTMAJob__c), AND( FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_CoreTMAJob__c, NOT(FSM_TMAConstraintDatesViolated__c), OR( OR( TEXT(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_NoticeType__c) = "05", TEXT(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_NoticeType__c) = "04", TEXT(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_NoticeType__c) = "00" ), AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_NoticeType__c, "01"), ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_NoticeType__c, "02"), ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_NoticeType__c, "03") ), OR( ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PLND"), ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PDP"), ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "PA"), ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_TMAPermit__r.FSM_TMAApprovalStatus__c, "WIP") ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Ready For Dispatch
